The novel delves into environmental activism on a grand scale, as Sam and his team race against time to prevent this catastrophe. They uncover secrets hidden deep within the Earth and an ancient threat that could change the course of human history. The narrative combines science, action, and suspense, making it a gripping read.

Title: Operation Forest Shield

Objective: To shut down an illegally operated logging site in [location], protecting the local ecosystem and wildlife while minimizing harm to innocent people.

Timeline: 3 phases - Intelligence Gathering, Preparation, and Execution. The operation would take approximately 3 months.

- Team of experienced investigators and activists
- Surveillance equipment

- Media outlets
